snippet: An explosion in the Syrian capital early Friday added to fears that attackers were focusing on places where civilians congregate in order to inflict maximum casualties.
abstract: Explosion strikes gas station in Syrian capital Damascus, killing at least 10 people in the second attack in three days on people lining up for scarce fuel.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and HWAIDA SAAD
byline.contributor: Hania Mourtada contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: An explosion in the Syrian capital early Friday added to fears that attackers were focusing on places where civilians congregate in order to inflict maximum casualties.

headline.seo: Gas Station Attack Kills at Least 10 in Syria
headline.main: Bomb Attack in Syria Kills at Least 10 as Reports of Executions Surface
headline.print_headline: Bomb Attack in Syria Kills at Least 10 as Reports of Executions Surface

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
